description: Trail consists of old fire road and single track which spends its time going through forest with openings for beautiful views of the scenery. There is even a section of hoodoos. The trail ends for mountain bikers at 11.6 km where there is a very nice campsite. From here you can continue on foot to the Brussels campsite then even furthernto the 12 person Sundance Alpine Club of Canada Hut, which must be reserved ahead of time.
directions:
In Jasper National Park, drive 1 km north of Athabasca Falls on Hwy. 93A. Turn left and follow the gravel road for 2 km to the Fryatt trailhead.
0.0-  trailhead
11.6-lower Fryatt campsite
title: Fryatt Valley Trail - 2
